name: Cobra
overview: Deng Dao has been abducted and killed by soldiers of the Black Monk. Cobra, his pupil, has sworn to revenge his master's death. Now you must help Cobra to restore peace and justice in the land. Features: * More than 48 colours ON-SCREEN * 50 pictures per second * Smooth, non-jerking animation * 11 levels (6 combat rounds and 5 qualifying rounds) * Training mode * More than 1.5 megabytes of graphics * Storable high-score list * Music during the game
